  "title": "A Note About the {Ki(z)} Functions",
  "comments": "Accepted in Rocky Mountain Journal of mathematics",
  "journal-ref": null,

  "categories": "math.NT math.CV",
  "license": null,
  "abstract": "  In the article [Petojevic 2006], A. Petojevi\\' c verified useful properties\nof the $K_{i}(z)$ functions which generalize Kurepa's [Kurepa 1971] left\nfactorial function. In this note, we present simplified proofs of two of these\nresults and we answer the open question stated in [Petojevic 2006]. Finally, we\ndiscuss the differential transcendency of the $K_{i}(z)$ functions.\n",
